rooms.description: Large open space combining entrance, living area, and kitchenette to create a welcoming Vastu-compliant layout. The entry is oriented towards the east for positive energy flow.
Spacious bedroom with south-west facing window for restful energy according to Vastu principles, ensuring privacy and calm environment.
Cozy guest room positioned on the north side, offering balanced energy flow and ample natural light.
Dedicated entertainment space with soundproof walls and ambient lighting. Located in a quiet section of the ground floor for optimal acoustics.
Combined bathroom/utility room located conveniently near the living areas but designed to ensure privacy, with east-facing openings to promote positive energy.
